name: MRI VR
description:
| PITCH

You know those fancy 3D-Visualizations from the series Bones? This is exactly that, but you can dynamically slice up the MRI scanned head in VR.

| WARNING

_ You need a VR headset to play. I only testet it on the HTC VIVE.

| CONTROLS

[VR headset]   Movement
[Motion Controllers]   Slice, Point
[Esc]   Quit
